New Records: India thrashed England by 68 runs to reach the final
Key Match Events: India post 171-7 after Rohit hits fine fifty
England dismissed for 103 in 16.4 overs, chasing 172
Jasprit Bumrah took 3 wickets for India
Axar Patel took 3 wickets for India
Kuldeep Yadav took 3 wickets for India
Jofra Archer was trapped lbw by Jasprit Bumrah
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted that India was the favourites given their performance in the tournament
Post-Match Reflections: India captain Rohit Sharma: 'It's very satisfying to win this game. We worked really hard as a unit.'
England captain Jos Buttler: 'India outplayed us, certainly. We let them maybe get 20/25 too many on a challenging surface that they played well on.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: India will face South Africa in Saturday's final
England's dreams are shattered. They were utterly outclassed.
India's spinners were pretty much unplayable.
The final will be played in Barbados on Saturday at 15:30 BST
